marklogic.body: I agree, Georgians need to make a choice that will put things to their advantage.Â The country of Georgia sits in very strategic territory.Â Â The Russians want to guard their front door and The Americans want to look in.Â Man what a tight Spot.Â This really puts the Georgians into a position of power and all involved know it, why do you think the US imposed their paper embargo, they were trying to put a point across to the Georgian government(obviously they pissed someone Off demanding something) to put them into line.
